org.eclipselabs.emfpath.util
Class EPackages

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipselabs.emfpath.util.EPackages

public class EPackages
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to search for an EPackage in a ResourceSet.

An EPackage can be get by:

  • simple name (the first EPackage with the same name will be returned)
  • fully qualified name (segment separator can be configured with separator(String))
  • namespace URI (as defined by EPackage.getNsURI())

Since:
0.1.0
Author:
MikaÃ«l barbero

public static EPackages from(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet resourceSet)

the search object

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if resourceSet is null

withName

public org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage withName(java.lang.String name)
                                        throws NotFoundException
Search for an EPackage with the given name. It returns the first one with the given name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the searched package.
Returns:
the first package with the given name
Throws:
NotFoundException - if the EPackage cannot be found
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or empty.

separator

public EPackages separator(java.lang.String sep)
Configure this object to use sep as fully qualified name segment separator instead of DEFAULT_FULL_NAME_SEPARATOR.

Parameters:
sep - the separator string to use.
Returns:
this search object re-configured
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sep is null or empty

withFullyQualifiedName

public org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage withFullyQualifiedName(java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName)
                                                      throws NotFoundException
Search for an EPackage with the given fully qualified name . It returns the first one with the given name.

Parameters:
fullyQualifiedName - the fully qualified name of the EPackage to search.
Returns:
the first EPackage with the given fullyQualifiedName.
Throws:
NotFoundException - if the EPackage can not be found.

fullyQualifiedName

public static java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage ePackage)
Returns the fully qualified name of the given EPackage. Each segments of the fully qualified name are separated by DEFAULT_FULL_NAME_SEPARATOR. Equivalent to:

EPackages.fullyQualifiedName(ePackage, EPackages.DEFAULT_FULL_NAME_SEPARATOR)

Parameters:
ePackage - the package to get the full name from
Returns:
the fully qualified name

fullyQualifiedName

public static java.lang.String fullyQualifiedName(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage ePackage,
                                                  java.lang.String separator)
Returns the fully qualified name of the given EPackage. Each segments of the fully qualified name are separated by the separator string.

Parameters:
ePackage - the package to get the full name from.
separator - the string to separate the name segments.
Returns:
the fully qualified name
